channel.title: Getting Traffic to Your Website Podcast
channel.description: Listen in and learn simple, and low cost or free ways to get highly targeted visitors to your website or blog. End the drudgery of traffic building, and start having fun creating traffic.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Make Getting Traffic to Your Website Fun and Easy
channel.itunes:author: Wayne Sharer
channel.itunes:summary: Listen in and learn simple, and low cost or free ways to get highly targeted visitors to your website or blog. End the drudgery of traffic building, and start having fun creating traffic.

item.title: The Ultimate IM Pack Changes Ways to Make Money Online
item.description:
This episode may seem commercial, but to me, it is very exciting.

Why? Because you are going to discover how to optimize your plan for ways to make money online.  You are going to find out how a single program that doesn't cost $10,000 or $5,000 or even $200 can explode your business this year.  Even in the middle of a recession.

Join me, and you'll be introduced to 13 different ways to rapidly expand toward the 6 figure income you need to be secure.

I'll show you how  you can build a booming business with one investment in your future.  You'll have massive cost of trial and error eliminated as you uncover a once in a lifetime chance to get mountains of business building secrets literally handed to you.

Resources mentioned in this episode:

  • YourTrafficStarterBlog.com
  • TheUltimateIMPack.com

item.title: More Website Traffic - The Easy Way or Expensive Way?
item.description:
More website traffic is what every online business owner needs to accomplish the 5 fundemental steps of creating a successful online business.  In this episode, I will introduce you to the fundementals of building success for your niche business. 

It doesn't matter what niche your in.  If you want to succeed and get your site as the highest traffic website in your niche, you must be applying these principles.

I'll cover the fundementals in detail, and introduce you to a system that will guarantee that you can successfully start your online business, and profit... even if you have no technical knowledge and an extremely low budget.

More website traffic is possible for you.  Here's how to get started.

Resources mentioned in this episode:

  • Get More Website Traffic at TrafficStarterPro.com
  • Learn to Buy Website Traffic
  • Targeted Web Traffic Training

item.title: Buy Website Traffic - The Power of Massive Backlinking
item.description:
One way to buy website traffic is to automate your ability to create one-way, inbound back links to your website. But how do you do this without spending countless hours requesting and inputting them?

Listen in and I will tell you exactly how to create a massive inbound back link network. It will be fully automated, and at extremely low cost.

This is what I mean to buy web site traffic!

    Resources mentioned in this episode:
  • YourTrafficStarterBlog.com
  • Auto Social Poster Review Facts
  • Traffic-Bug Review
  • Bookmark Generation by Howie Schwartz Review Facts
  • Ping FM and Tweeter Feed
  • Atomic Blogging 3.0 by Alvin Phang Review Facts

item.title: Buy Website Traffic - Power Twitter Traffic
item.description:
Now it's time to connect your blog and start an effective social network. Socializing your blog will create massive backlinks, and generate tons of targeted traffic.

By using the right Twitter tools, you can buy web site traffic in the bucket loads from places like Twitter.

I get over 20% of my targeted traffic from Twitter, and it is because I bought the correct tools. Learn now, how to buy website traffic with Twitter...

    Resources mentioned in this espisode:
  • Twitter Online System by Alvin Phang
  • Social Money Magnet by Jeff Alderson and Charles Kirkland
  • Atomic Blogging by Alvin Phang
  • Your Traffic Starter Blog

item.title: Buy Web Site Traffic - Accelerate Your Blog Targeted Traffic
item.description:
If you have been following along, you should have selected your niche, and it is a profitable one. This includes selecting your mentor, and infinitely increasing your chance to excel very rapidly.

Now you are ready to install your blog website. I am going to tell you exactly how to install your blog - and - how to guarantee you rapidly turn your blog into a targeted traffic magnetic.

Follow this plan, and you buy web site traffic that will last for life! Listen in now and create a rapidly growing business on an extremely low budget...

    Resources mentioned in this episode...

  • Alvin Phang's Atomic Blogging 3.0 - Honest Review

  • How to Install Your Blog Video

item.title: Buy Web Site Traffic - You Must Find a Niche First!
item.description:
Did you listen to the previous epidsode? It had my blueprint for accelerating targeted traffic to your web site.
Perhaps you missed. Get the previous episode first, then this one, and you'll fully understand what I mean when I say 'buy web site traffic.'
I'm not talking about running costly pay per click promotions, or purchasing recycled leads, or get pop hits from a loser 'guaranteed web traffic' company.
This is how to invest in the right place, at low cost, to guarantee targeted website traffic forever!
Listen in and learn how to pick your massive, targeted traffic, profit filled niche...

    Resources mentioned in this episode:
  • YourTrafficStarterBlog
  • Tellman List Building Club Model
  • Maverick Money Makers Affiliate Model
  • Traffic-Bug.com

item.title: Increase Online Traffic - Complete Low Cost Blueprint
item.description:
Are you ready to increase online traffic - right from the start of your website going live?
Here is a complete targeted traffic blueprint that you can use to start your online business and get targeted traffic moving to your website or blog immediately. That's right, I am giving you my blueprint to increase online traffic, right from the start free!...
This targeted traffic plan will work for anyone at any stage that is having difficulty getting traffic. So listen in now...

item.title: Increase Targeted Web Traffic with Viral Video Marketing
item.description:
Is it possible to "force" your marketing video to go viral? How much can you depend on your videos to create real traffic results? Can it be done without expensive advertising? Listen in today and find out how you can increase website traffic through the use of viral video marketing.

  • TubeMogul

item.title: Increase Blog Traffic - How to Boost Your Blog Traffic
item.description:
Increase your blog traffic - Can you do it? Of course you can. The real question is - Do you know how to increase blog traffic?

This episode launches you into the best blog traffic tools on the net, and only the ones that are free and really work. Use these tools correctly, and you will increase your blog traffic and your targeted website traffic.

Listen in now for the latest targeted website traffic tool:

item.title: Special Episode - Website Traffic and Making Money Online
item.description:
I had the distinct pleasure to personally interview Rick Burdo of the Disabled Veterans Teleseminar Training, and talk to him about what it takes to get a valuable online training program together.

In this enlightening interview, Rick reveals exactly how you or anyone can get started online, and shares an amazing story about how he has succeeded. You won't believe how Rick does it.

Listen in and KNOW that you can do it too!

Resources mentioned in this episode:

  • YourTrafficStarterBlog
  • Send An Email A Day Blog
  • Free ($2,000 value) Listbuilding Audio
  • Disabled Veterans Teleseminar

item.title: SEO - The Key to Getting Free Targeted Web Traffic for Life
item.description:
In this episode, I'll share with you exactly what I consider my biggest mistake in getting targeted web traffic started to my blog and websites. My blog sat lost in the search engines for a long time because of this mistake. So let me show you how to avoid it and make search engine traffic part of your plan.

    Resources mentioned in this episode:
  • Live Web Tele Training
  • Secrets to Web Traffic Explosion
  • YourTrafficStarterBlog.com

This episode focuses on the 7 main steps of choosing your online niche so you can be certain you will find targeted web traffic that is eager to buy. Listen in....

item.title: Making Profit from Your Targeted Web Traffic
item.description:
Every part of making profits from your targeted traffic and blog traffic depends on how well you put together all the parts. And, like in any new venture, to put the parts together and profit you need expert advice, and a very good plan.

In this episode, I look in detail at what happens when you don't have a plan, and the effects of not listening to the experts. If you want your targeted traffic to create profits, you will also find out exactly how to get it done.

Resources for this Episode:
  • ListbuildingClubNow.com
  • MaverickMoneyMakersMount.com
  • YourTrafficStarterBlog.com

item.title: Special Episode - Disabled Veterans Teleseminar with Rick Burdo
item.description:
This is a special announcement episode. It is my special request that you share this with as many people as possible. Veterans and non-veterans alike. Why non-veterans? So they can tell there veteran friends.

This is very important to me, so please give a veteran a chance to make a real income online. My friend Rick Burdo has put his heart into creating a training series for disabled veterans... and I want to personally help spread the word

    Here's the links to pass around
  • http://www.sendaemailaday.com/DVTele/
  • http://www.hmigroupmoneymaking.com/2544

item.description:
Every step of your targeted traffic and blog traffic efforts requires a plan and working system. To do this, even with Twitter, you should not be inventing this on your own (unless you are already making tons of money online on autopilot).

This episode will show you how to implement a proven twitter online system so you can accelerate your website traffic from Twitter, and create a profit system at the same time
